name: Ifield Court Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here before recent flight from Gatwick. Had no problems whatsoever, very helpful staff who explained clearly the procedures for getting to/from gatwick. Nice bar area to unwind and chat to fellow travellers and food was fine if a tad expensive. Rooms were clean and warm and for the price you can't fault it. Will be using again if we can get a similar deal
reviews.title: Slick operation at a great price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for one night on the 24th November before our early flight and this was my first experience of staying in a hotel the night before as we usually drive up on the day of departure and I have to say I will definitely stay here again
reviews.title: Good hotel and good location

reviews.text: The taxi arrived on time to take us to the airport (about 10 minutes away) and the food and service at this hotel is excellent for an overnight stay.

description: Ifield Court, Gatwick Hotel and Restaurant is a delightful country house hotel situated just outside Gatwick Airport and two miles from Crawley town centre. The hotel is the ideal stopover for the Gatwick traveller looking for overnight accommodation. We offer holiday parking and operate a 24h Gatwick transfer service. Our restaurant offers outstanding cuisine at a fantastic price.
